title: Chapter XXIII - NIAGARA FRONTIER TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
content:
Chapter XXIII - NIAGARA FRONTIER TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
State Regulations

Part 1150 - General (§ 1150.1 to 1150.10)

Part 1151 - Personal Conduct (§ 1151.1 to 1151.24)

Part 1152 - Vehicles And Traffic (§ 1152.1 to 1152.27)

Part 1153 - Dangerous Articles (§ 1153.1 to 1153.6)

Part 1154 - Commercial Activity (§ 1154.1 to 1154.8)

Part 1155 - Operations (§ 1155.1 to 1155.11)

Part 1156 - Rules Governing Public Access To Records Of The Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority And Niagara Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc (§ 1156.1 to 1156.11)

Part 1157 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (§ 1157.1 to 1157.11)

Part 1158 - Personal Privacy Protection (§ 1158.1 to 1158.13)

Part 1159 - Procurement Guidelines of Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority and Niagara Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc (§ 1159.1 to 1159.5)

Part 1160 - COMMERCIAL GROUND TRANSPORTATION RULES AND REGULATIONS FOR THE LANDSIDE TERMINAL OPERATIONS AT THE BUFFALO NIAGARA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (§ 1160.1 to 1160.22)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
